hero.name: Ranielli Montagna

passion.part2: passionate about creating exceptional digital experiences

hero.description: I have experience in developing web and mobile applications, with a focus on quality, performance, and usability.

bio.name: Ranielli Montagna
bio.intro: a full stack developer passionate about turning ideas into innovative digital solutions. With over 3 years of experience, I specialize in creating web and mobile applications that combine exceptional functionality with intuitive design.
bio.journey: My journey began with a curiosity about how things work on the web, and since then I have been developing projects that positively impact people's lives. I believe technology should be accessible and make a difference.
bio.hobbies: When I'm not coding, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, or planning my next development adventure.

experience.subtitle: Over 3 years building innovative solutions in companies of different sizes and segments, always focused on delivering value and growing technically.

luizalabs.description: I am part of the Luizalabs team, the technology innovation unit of Magalu, one of Brazil's largest retailers. I develop and maintain web and mobile applications for physical store operations, as well as robust and scalable APIs and backend solutions.
highlights: Development of applications for retail operations
Maintenance of APIs and backend solutions
System integration in a high-impact environment
Work with modern and scalable technologies

smarten.description: I led a team of developers, ensuring code quality and application optimization. I created and maintained the corporate design system, and implemented monitoring and CI/CD solutions, boosting the efficiency and stability of the products.
highlights: Technical leadership of a developer team
Creation and maintenance of a design system

sbsistemas.description: First professional experience in the technology field, where I consolidated my technical foundation in front-end development. I developed applications using modern technologies and implemented best development practices.
highlights: Consolidation of a solid technical foundation

projects.subtitle: A selection of my most recent works, including web, mobile, and API applications that demonstrate my technical skills.

cta.text: Want to see more projects? Explore my GitHub repository with over 100 open source projects!

northClinic.title: North Clinic - Management System
northClinic.description: Complete management system for clinics and offices, with online scheduling, electronic health records, financial control, and billing.

mobileEstoquista.title: Magalu Stockist Mobile
mobileEstoquista.description: Corporate superapp for stockists at Magalu's physical stores, optimizing inventory control, goods receipt, and dispatch.

pratio.title: Pratio - POS for Restaurants
pratio.description: Point of sale (POS) and management system for bars and restaurants, with table and order control, NFC-e issuing, and a digital menu.

smartDs.title: Smart Design System
smartDs.description: A design system based on Material Design, aimed at standardizing product interfaces to improve the user experience.

sennaDs.title: Senna Design System
sennaDs.description: A design system used for Next.js projects, with the goal of standardizing product interfaces to enhance the user experience.

alemDoArcoIrisApp.title: Além do Arco-Íris App
alemDoArcoIrisApp.description: The 'Além do Arco-íris' app offers the course 'Ally: a holistic approach to LGBT+ health' to empower healthcare professionals in assisting the LGBT+ community.

motiviumBot.title: Motivium Bot
motiviumBot.description: A custom Discord bot built with TypeScript and Discord.js. It leverages financial APIs to deliver automated currency updates and includes a scheduled messaging system.

tabSwitch.title: Tab Switch
tabSwitch.description: A browser extension that allows automatic rotation between open tabs, closing other non-configured tabs. Ideal for presentations, monitoring dashboards, and other situations where tab rotation is needed.

pdfGenerator.title: PDF Generator API
pdfGenerator.description: A high-performance API for dynamic PDF generation, engineered with Fastify, TypeScript, and PDFKit. It leverages TypeBox for robust, type-safe request validation, providing a scalable and reliable document creation service.

contact.subtitle: I'm interested in freelance or full-time opportunities. If you have a project in mind or just want to chat, I'd be happy to talk.

methods.title: Contact methods
methods.subtitle: Prefer another way to get in touch? Choose one of the options below:

form.title: Send a message
form.subtitle: Fill out the form below and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

subject.label: Subject
subject.placeholder: What would you like to talk about?

form.success: Message sent successfully! I'll get back to you soon.
form.error: Automatic sending failed. Your email client will open as an alternative.

validation.name: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.subject: Subject must be at least 5 characters
validation.message: Message must be at least 10 characters

footer.madeWith: Made with ❤️ using Next.js, TypeScript and Tailwind CSS

services.subtitle: I offer complete development solutions, from conception to delivery, focusing on quality and exceptional results.

web-development.title: Web Development
web-development.description: Creation of modern, responsive and performant web applications using the best market technologies.

mobile-development.title: Mobile Development
mobile-development.description: Native and hybrid applications for iOS and Android with exceptional user experience.

api-development.title: API Development
api-development.description: Robust and scalable backend systems designed to power your applications with high performance.

ai-integration.title: AI Integration
ai-integration.description: Smart solutions powered by Artificial Intelligence to automate processes and enhance user experience.

cta.title: Ready to start your project?
cta.subtitle: Let's talk about how I can help turn your idea into reality.
